title: 'Why War?': How thinkers answer this heartbreaking question
subhead: Since the bloodbath of World War I, philosophers have repeatedly grappled with the question: Is war an irrepressible human urge, or the product of historical and social forces?

title: Europe will 'stand united' in response to Trump's tariff threats over Greenland
Amichai Chikli, the Israeli diaspora affairs minister challenging the Jewish diaspora
Russian militarization of winter hardens resolve in Kyiv: 'We're freezing, but we won't give in'
subhead: Daily Russian attacks on energy infrastructure have left residents of the Ukrainian capital without electricity and heating as temperatures drop to −15°C. The strategy does not appear to have dampened Kyivans' spirits.

title: A 'night of deep pain' for Spain after fatal train collision
subhead: At least 21 people were killed and 73 were injured after two trains collided in southern Spain. Officials say that the death toll will likely increase.

title: New York rapper A$AP Rocky makes comeback in new album, balancing fury and serenity
subhead: After an eight-year wait, the artist – and Rihanna's partner – has released his fourth album, 'Don't Be Dumb.' The varied and accomplished record features collaborations with Tim Burton, Tyler, The Creator, Doechii and Damon Albarn.

title: The meteoric rise of Arthur Mensch, France's AI champion
subhead: In less than three years, the co-founder and head of the young French start-up Mistral AI has become a leading figure in the rapid rise of artificial intelligence worldwide.

Minneapolis emerges as new epicenter of resistance to Trump: 'ICE wasn't expecting that'
subhead: For several weeks, Minnesota's largest metropolitan area has been living under the strain of Operation Metro Surge, which saw the deployment of 2,000 Immigration and Customs Enforcement officers. Since the death of Renee Good on January 7, tensions with residents have reached a peak.

title: Mercosur-EU: What the trade deal contains for the agriculture, minerals and industrial sectors
subhead: Despite the controversy, the free trade agreement between the EU and four countries in the Mercosur trade bloc will have a limited economic impact. Its implementation is set to be very gradual, while containing several safeguards.

title: 'That 'Stranger Things' brings Prince or David Bowie back to life is both wonderful and dreadful'
subhead: In the final episode of the hit Netflix series, 15- to 25-year-olds discovered 'Purple Rain' and 'Heroes,' whose streams have soared across music platforms. Unfortunately, the younger generation has limited itself to these snippets, showing little interest in the artists or their discographies, writes Michel Guerrin, editor-in-chief of Le Monde, in his column.
